# 深度强化学习综述（刘全等）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zongshu-liuquan-deng
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zongshu-liuquan-deng
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zongshu-liuquan-deng
shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zongshu-liuquan-deng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zongshu-liuquan-deng
shendu-qianghua-xuexi-zongshu-liuquan-deng <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
